header_section.title: Earn Additional Income With Crypto Staking
header_section.description: Earn extra income by staking your favorite crypto. The way Crypto Staking works is by securing the associated coin protocol and in return you will earn interest on your coins. Unlike bank deposits, staking interest can be taken daily or weekly.

media.title: Watch our youtube video to learn complete tutorial step to do Triv Staking
media.description: By using Triv staking, you will earn additional income while HODLing your coin, it is suitable for long term investor that believe the growth of your coin ecosystem. No fee, No risk and Insured for your all Triv staking transactions.

benefit.title: Benefits of staking crypto on Triv

benefits.title: 100% Insured
benefits.description: Triv cold storage is insured by Bitgo custodian & Lloyd England up to 100 million USD .

benefits.title: 0% Fee
benefits.description: Receive interest without any deductions, the interest shown is the interest you get clean.

benefits.title: Dividend Yield
benefits.description: Interest is distributed regularly and you can disburse it directly to 61 banks & E-wallet supported by the Triv system 24 hours without holidays.

guide_crypto_section.title: Guide on how to easily stake crypto on TRIV

guides.title: Pick your favorite coin
guides.description: Choose from a variety of coins supported by Triv. Crypto Staking is suitable for long-term investors who believe in the growth of the coin.

guides.title: Set stake amount
guides.description: Enter your desired amount to be staked, you can start staking as low as 100.000 IDR within Triv system.

guides.title: Happy earning !
guides.description: You will receive your interest daily or weekly , All interest can be withdrawn to bank instantly or re-stake and grow bigger with your staking stash.

coin_section.title: What Coins Can Be Staked at TRIV?
coin_section.description: Start from now. Choose your favorite asset and grow your crypto with TRIV, the best Crypto Staking in Indonesia

questions.title: What is Crypto Staking?
questions.description: Crypto Staking is the process of locking your coins in a proof of stake blockchain to secure the coin network for dividend yield. The interest is the interest of the associated blockchain protocol and not of Triv.

questions.title: Apa Keuntungan Staking Crypto?

start_now_section.description: Build a crypto portfolio. Grow it with the best crypto staking in the Triv ecosystem, the Indonesian Cryptocurrency marketplace, registered and supervised by Bappebti.
